commentAnnotations.text: Subjects may be treated beyond disease progression under protocol-defined conditions. See Section 3.1.6
Fine needle aspiration (FNA) and bone metastases samples are not acceptable for submission
Refer to the sorafenib SmPC for additional details.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Incorporates Amendment 18 and Administrative Letter 04. Updates guidance for nivolumab and adds exploratory objective for tumor inflammation.
Incorporates Amendment 16 and Administrative Letters 02 and 03. Changes ORR to secondary objective.
Incorporates Amendment 11. Co-primary endpoint changed from TTP to ORR.
Incorporates Amendment 02. Addition of PBMC and MDSC collection.
